document_data.mainbody:
Malakos was a notable wizard inhabiting the city of Yhep along the Lake of Steam during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
He made potions for amorous merchants and contraceptives for the heirs of Yheps wealthy families.
Malakos was secretly a devout follower of Iyachtu Xvim and a member of the Twisted Rune who monitored events in Yhep.
